paper_abstract: This paper deals with the parallel numerical solution of a 3D continuous flow electrophoresis problem governed by Navier-Stokes equations coupled with transport and potential equations. For this problem, using the properties of the discrete operators, the convergence of synchronous and asynchronous parallel Schwarz alternating methods is analysed. Finally, parallel solvers are implemented and the results of simulations are given. (C) 2007 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Parallel asynchronous iterations for the solution of a 3D continuous flow electrophoresis problem
